title: How long does it take for you to finally answer a ticket?
body: I've sent two tickets already asking for something and nobody is responding, how long does it usually take for you to get of your lazy ass and respond?

replies.body: It depends on where it's being fielded to.  Creating duplicate tickets could cause confusion and delay, though.  Toss me your ticket number and I'll be happy to check on the status for you.

Thanks!  Your ticket was successfully received and fielded to our account team.  Keep in mind not to reply to your ticket until you receive a response though, as doing so can return you to the bottom of the queue.  Hang tight!
